SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

io.mpos.mock
Interface MockConfiguration

public interface MockConfiguration

The mock configuration defines the behaviour of the mock implementation (e.g. MockProvider for the MOCK provider mode).

All changes are applied globally and for all active providers.

Nested Class Summary
static class MockConfiguration.AccessoryUpdateBehavior
          Configures the update behavior of the accessory.
static class MockConfiguration.GatewayBehavior
          The available outcomes of the processing gateway for a mock transaction.

          The available payment outcomes for a mock transaction.

          Available options for an accessory.
static class MockConfiguration.PaymentAccessorySource
          The available payment sources for a mock transaction.
